mapper.update: UPDATE POWERLINK SET POWERLINK_CNT = POWERLINK_CNT + 1, POWERLINK_TIME = 120 WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{member_id} AND SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(POWERLINK_DATE, 'RR-MM-DD'), 1, 5) = SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'RR-MM-DD'), 1, 5)
mapper.select: SELECT COMPANY_NAME, SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(POWERLINK_DATE), 1, 2) "YEAR", SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(POWERLINK_DATE), 4, 2) "MON", SUM(POWERLINK_CNT) "COUNT" FROM POWERLINK JOIN MEMBER_COMPANY USING (MEMBER_ID) WHERE MEMBER_ID = 'comp11' GROUP BY COMPANY_NAME, SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(POWERLINK_DATE), 1, 2),SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(POWERLINK_DATE), 4, 2) ORDER BY 2 DESC, 3 DESC
